<JD_START>
Job Title: Director of Sales Marketing

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Position Overview: Full time remote opportunity, reporting directly to the CEO & President, the Manager of Sales & Marketing holds a pivotal role in driving the company's sales success. This role encompasses leading the team, orchestrating the entire sales cycle, and ensuring the company meets its sales objectives. 
Responsibilities include overseeing business development, sales, marketing, and social media efforts, as well as managing budgets and crafting yearly sales and marketing plans aligned with company goals.
The ideal candidate will thrive in a fast-paced environment, possess strong strategic thinking skills, and be results-oriented. Flexibility and adaptability to challenges are key attributes for success in this role.Responsibilities:Execute sales, business, and company objectives.Develop and implement plans to expand existing business and capture new opportunities.Formulate new project strategies and cultivate trust with clients/customers.Manage client accounts and expectations, identifying and implementing sales strategies.Negotiate sales contracts and analyze sales data to drive better solutions.Drive revenue growth by prospecting and developing new business.Plan and execute sales and marketing initiatives.Monitor team pipeline for growth and business development performance.Maintain market awareness by researching industry trends.Identify and pursue new sales leads and opportunities.Facilitate business meetings and presentations with prospective clients.Review bid packages and formulate proposal bid sales packages.Mentor and provide feedback to team members to enhance performance.Represent the organization at networking events and industry gatherings.
Requirements and Desired Experience:Bachelor’s degree in sales, business administration, marketing, or related field.Minimum of ten years of sales experience with at least three years in management.Three or more years of experience in EMC/EMI/Wireless or RF Shielding Industry.Expertise in business strategy and market development.Proven track record in business development and relationship building.Ability to interpret blueprints and shop drawings.Excellent communication and negotiation skills.Strong organizational and time management abilities.Self-motivated with a positive attitude and a collaborative mindset.Proficiency in Microsoft Office, social media platforms, and virtual meeting software.Willingness to travel as necessary and perform physical tasks as required.
This position offers an exciting opportunity for a driven individual to make a significant impact on the company's success

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
